docs.snippet: In a match controversially sanctioned by the New York State Athletic Commission for the vacant world heavyweight title, Joe Frazier will oppose Buster Mathis in a championship double-header that will be the first boxing show at the new Madison Squ...
docs.lead_paragraph: In a match controversially sanctioned by the New York State Athletic Commission for the vacant world heavyweight title, Joe Frazier will oppose Buster Mathis in a championship double-header that will be the first boxing show at the new Madison Square Garden.

headline.main: Garden Lists Frazier-Mathis, Griffith-Benvenuti Title Bouts on Same Card; FIGHTERS ASSURED PURSE OF $505,000 Ringside Seats at $100 for March Card -- Heavyweight Bout Stirs Controversy

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan, 2 -- The crowds on the beaches and hotelkeepers' preparations for the annual invasion of foreign tourists make it hard to believe that Uruguay is the object of a massive economic rescue operation led by the United States ...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan, 2 -- The crowds on the beaches and hotelkeepers' preparations for the annual invasion of foreign tourists make it hard to believe that Uruguay is the object of a massive economic rescue operation led by the United States and assisted by the Soviet Union.
docs.abstract: Govt ban on slaughter of cattle, Oct-Nov '67, hurt domestic econ

headline.main: UNDER THE GAIETY, CRISIS IN URUGUAY; Massive Economic Rescue Operation Is Under Way

docs.snippet: Fourth-quarter futility, the affliction the New York Knickerbockers have suffered from all season, struck on schedule at Madison Square Garden last night. Leading the Cincinnati Royals, 94-88, after three quarters, the Knicks produced only four ba...
docs.lead_paragraph: Fourth-quarter futility, the affliction the New York Knickerbockers have suffered from all season, struck on schedule at Madison Square Garden last night. Leading the Cincinnati Royals, 94-88, after three quarters, the Knicks produced only four baskets in the next 8 1/2 minutes and went on to lose, 125-119.

headline.main: Knicks Suffer Sixth Straight Loss as Royals Rally to Win, 125-119; NEW YORK LOSES LATE 6-POINT LEAD

docs.snippet: Irradiation of foods by gamma rays for protection against spoilage was begun on a commercial basis recently in a plant situated in a quiet section of Clearfield County, Pa., 10 miles from the small community of Karsthaus....
docs.lead_paragraph: Irradiation of foods by gamma rays for protection against spoilage was begun on a commercial basis recently in a plant situated in a quiet section of Clearfield County, Pa., 10 miles from the small community of Karsthaus.
docs.abstract: Nuclear Materials Equipment Corp to mkt irradiated foods commercially; experiments supported by Army indicate effects vary; products with best chance for future FDA clearance listed

headline.main: FOOD STERILIZED BY NUCLEAR RAYS; Process to Reduce Spoilage Is Begun Commercially

docs.snippet: CLARENCE OSCAR ANDERSON is not a name immediately recognizable on the scholastic scene, especially when one associates him during the winter sports season as the Montclair (N.J.) hockey coach....
docs.lead_paragraph: CLARENCE OSCAR ANDERSON is not a name immediately recognizable on the scholastic scene, especially when one associates him during the winter sports season as the Montclair (N.J.) hockey coach.

headline.main: Hockey Is Receiving a Big Push Toward Major Status in Jersey

docs.snippet: The New York Knickerbockers will oppose the Cincinnati Royals in the second half of a National Basketball Association double-header tonight at Madison Square Garden. In the opener at 6:30 P.M., the Detroit Pistons meet the Baltimore Bullets....
docs.lead_paragraph: The New York Knickerbockers will oppose the Cincinnati Royals in the second half of a National Basketball Association double-header tonight at Madison Square Garden. In the opener at 6:30 P.M., the Detroit Pistons meet the Baltimore Bullets.

headline.main: Knicks Oppose Royals Tonight; Pistons, Bullets in Opener Here
